snippet: The Iranians have managed to steadily increase their enrichment of uranium and are now producing a concentrated form close to bomb grade.
abstract: News analysis; Iran has managed to steadily increase its enrichment of uranium and is now raising its production of a concentrated form close to bomb grade, despite the widely publicized efforts to disrupt its nuclear program.
lead_paragraph: The Iranians have managed to steadily increase their enrichment of uranium and are now producing a concentrated form close to bomb grade.

headline.seo: Iran’s High Card at the Nuclear Negotiation Table
headline.main: Iran’s High Card at the Nuclear Table
headline.print_headline: Iran’s High Card at the Nuclear Table
